reviews.review: i love this game but the only problem is that theres loads of cheaters
Good game have played before on other account is always fun to play but u also match cheaters often at high elo when u have low trust :(
Played CS in various versions since about 2000. CS:GO is a great game!
Hitboxes are broken, but thats to be expected, overall, very fun and rewarding for grinding
Me parece un buen juego pero tiene muchos tryhards y cheaters, una pena
Ich liebe dieses Spiel ich sehe auch keinen Hacker mehr
Had so much fun over the 500 hours i have in this game. 499 of them have been encountering cheaters
game is ok sometimes cheater in game sometimes some noobs like me :)
i've won over 40 comp matches so far and still havent gotten out of silver II lets go!
THIS GAME IS A MENTAL ILLNESS
so good game i love it so much more than my boyfriend even, this game give me hope in this dark world very good i reccomend
O maior FPS de todos os tempos.
